description: This table stores the anatomical regions of this order.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ANATOMICAL_REGION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the Anatomical Region category IDs associated to this procedure.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other


Abdomen


Lung


Pelvis


Spine
